mapper.select: select (select count(blog.comment.id) from blog.comment) as comment, (select count(blog.chunibyou.id) from blog.chunibyou) as chunibyou, (select count(blog.note.id) from blog.note) as note, (select count(blog.recommend.id) from blog.recommend) as recommend, (select count(blog.saysay.id) from blog.saysay) as saysay;
